thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com | 2 of 108
thread.title: Barbara Wallace

author: Barbara Wallace
title: Barbara Wallace
text: I am fairly new to this site so and not knowing anything about this site I was a bit reluctant to use it for all of my purchases. I just processed my second payout and am totally sold on this site. The cashback percentages are larger than I am used to and there seem to be more stores with cashback opportunities. I use PayPal for my payouts and the money arrives quickly. I will be using this site more often and I definitely recommend it to anyone.
